name: Panic-Attack
description:
It is made for the "OUT OF TIME JAM"

The theme was: "RUNNING OUT OF TIME"

so this game is about a newspaper boy who needs to deliver newspapers before "HE RUNS OUT OF TIME"

there is a timer, you need to go to your customer before time runs out ,

if you do the customers will be disappointed.

you can adjust the between settings in the pause menu 

but you would have to do that every time the scene loads
